do_if.value: event.name == 'event_conversation_next_section' and event.object == event.param2.{3} and not event.object.skillsvisible and not event.object.isplayerowned and event.object.container.isplayerowned and event.object.owner.relationto.{faction.player} ge faction.player.relation.friend.min
do_if.chance: if global.$nfconfig.$cheatShowCandidates? and global.$nfconfig.$cheatShowCandidates then 100 else 0
